sys_ux_data_broker_scriptlet.name: Get all apps

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_data_broker_scriptlet_0e829da407a361102b80fe4f7c1ed032
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_data_broker_scriptlet"><sys_ux_data_broker_scriptlet action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><api_name>x_13258_applicat_0.Get all apps</api_name><description/><mutates_server_data>false</mutates_server_data><name>Get all apps</name><output_schema/><private>false</private><props/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><schema_version>1.0.0</schema_version><script><![CDATA[function transform() {
    var result = [];
    var obj = {};
    var grApps = new GlideRecord('sys_scope');
    grApps.query();
    while (grApps.next()) {
        obj.id = grApps.getValue('sys_id');
        obj.label = grApps.getValue('name');
        result.push(obj);
    }
    return result;

}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_ux_data_broker_scriptlet</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-06-17 07:06:06</sys_created_on><sys_id>0e829da407a361102b80fe4f7c1ed032</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Get all apps</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Application Explorer" source="x_13258_applicat_0">52fee90207db61102b80fe4f7c1ed041</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Application Explorer">52fee90207db61102b80fe4f7c1ed041</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_data_broker_scriptlet_0e829da407a361102b80fe4f7c1ed032</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-06-17 07:07:36</sys_updated_on></sys_ux_data_broker_scriptlet><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=0e829da407a361102b80fe4f7c1ed032"/></record_update>
